body: Police receive calls of shots fired at the 2000 block of Yorkshire Avenue. They discover a structure fire and an injured female shooting victim, in a vehicle outside the house.
title: Santa Monica Police receive first 911 call
caption: The Santa Monica City College shooter allegedly shot a woman sitting in a car outside a burned home in Santa Monica, Calif. on June 7th, 2013.

body: Santa Monica Fire Dept. receives a call reporting a structure fire on the 2000 block of Yorkshire.
title: Santa Monica Fire Department receives first call
caption: Firefighters gather outside a Santa Monica home where two men were found dead.

body: Police receive calls of a man seen shooting in the direction of a Big Blue Bus on Pico and Cloverfield. It is later reported that the suspect carjacked a woman and forced her at gunpoint to drive to Santa Monica College, stopping along the way to shoot at random.  The Big Blue Bus confirmed that two people were injured on one of their buses, one grazed by a bullet and one by broken glass.
title: Suspect's first stop
caption: Bullet holes are seen on a public transit bus in which two passengers were shot, after multiple shootings were reported at various locations including Santa Monica College June 7, 2013 in Santa Monica, California.

body: Suspect forces carjacking victim to stop near 20th and Pico, where he begins shooting at random.
title: Suspect's second stop
caption: Los Angeles Police Officers stand watch over the scene of a shooting at Pico and Cloverfield boulevards.

body: Shots fired at 20th St. and Pearl St. Police discover a victim, 68-year-old Carlos Navarro Franco, shot dead in his red Ford Explorer. A female passenger was also gravely injured and rushed to a nearby hospital.
title: Suspect kills 68-year-old Carlos Navarro Franco
caption: Law enforcement personal invstigate the shooting scene where an SUV crashed throught the wall of a parking lot and hit several cars across the street from the Santa Monica College where a multiple shootings happened on campus June 7, 2013 in Santa Monica, California.

body: Suspect shoots a woman outside the SMC library, then enters and begins shooting at students and faculty.
title: Suspect enters SMC library (Approx time)
caption: Video still image shows the suspect entering the Santa Monica Library on June 7, 2013.

body: Police recieve radio confirmation from an officer saying a shooter has been neutralized.
title: Police neutralize suspect
